comprehensive_report:
# Comprehensive BaZi Analysis Report

**Gender**: Male | **Age**: 2 | **Birth Year**: 2024

---

## SECTION 1: CHART SETUP

### Four Pillars (四柱)

| | Year (年柱) | Month (月柱) | Day (日柱) | Hour (时柱) |
|---|---|---|---|---|
| **Palace** | Parents/Ancestry | Career/Social | Self/Spouse | Children/Legacy |
| **Heavenly Stem** | 甲 (Jia) Wood | 乙 (Yi) Wood | 戊 (Wu) Earth | 甲 (Jia) Wood |
| **Earthly Branch** | 辰 (Chen) Earth | 丑 (Chou) Earth | 戌 (Xu) Earth | 寅 (Yin) Wood |
| **Hidden Stems** | 戊(75), 乙(25), 癸(10) | 己(75), 癸(25), 辛(10) | 戊(75), 辛(25), 丁(10) | 甲(75), 丙(25), 戊(10) |

### Day Master (日主)

**戊 (Wu) — Earth Yang**

*Wu Earth = the great mountain. Solid, reliable, unmovable, patient to a fault.*

Personality: reliable, patient, stubborn, protective, slow-to-change

### Ten Gods Map (十神)

| Location | Stem | Ten God | Chinese |
|---|---|---|---|
| year_stem | 甲 (Jia) | Seven Killings (7K) | 七殺 |
| year_branch_primary_qi (hidden) | 戊 (Wu) | Friend (F) | 比肩 |
| year_branch_hidden_1 (hidden) | 乙 (Yi) | Direct Officer (DO) | 正官 |
| year_branch_hidden_2 (hidden) | 癸 (Gui) | Direct Wealth (DW) | 正財 |
| month_stem | 乙 (Yi) | Direct Officer (DO) | 正官 |
| month_branch_primary_qi (hidden) | 己 (Ji) | Rob Wealth (RW) | 劫財 |
| month_branch_hidden_1 (hidden) | 癸 (Gui) | Direct Wealth (DW) | 正財 |
| month_branch_hidden_2 (hidden) | 辛 (Xin) | Hurting Officer (HO) | 傷官 |
| day_stem | 戊 (Wu) | Friend (F) | 比肩 |
| day_branch_primary_qi (hidden) | 戊 (Wu) | Friend (F) | 比肩 |
| day_branch_hidden_1 (hidden) | 辛 (Xin) | Hurting Officer (HO) | 傷官 |
| day_branch_hidden_2 (hidden) | 丁 (Ding) | Direct Resource (DR) | 正印 |
| hour_stem | 甲 (Jia) | Seven Killings (7K) | 七殺 |
| hour_branch_primary_qi (hidden) | 甲 (Jia) | Seven Killings (7K) | 七殺 |
| hour_branch_hidden_1 (hidden) | 丙 (Bing) | Indirect Resource (IR) | 偏印 |
| hour_branch_hidden_2 (hidden) | 戊 (Wu) | Friend (F) | 比肩 |

---

## SECTION 2: DAY MASTER STRENGTH ASSESSMENT

**Score: 50.0/100** (50 = perfectly balanced)

- Support count: 3.7
- Drain count: 4.7
- Seasonal state: Prosperous
- Verdict: **EXTREMELY STRONG**

*The Day Master is EXTREMELY STRONG. There is overwhelming support with very little opposition.*

### Useful God (用神): **Water** (水)

- Favorable elements: Water (水), Fire (火), Metal (金)
- Unfavorable elements: Wood (木), Earth (土)

---

## SECTION 3: TEN GODS DEEP ANALYSIS (十神)

| Ten God | Chinese | Strength | Visible | Hidden | Locations |
|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| Friend (F) | 比肩 | **PROMINENT** | 1 | 3 | year_branch_primary_qi, day_stem, day_branch_primary_qi, hour_branch_hidden_2 |
| Rob Wealth (RW) | 劫財 | **HIDDEN_ONLY** | 0 | 1 | month_branch_primary_qi |
| Eating God (EG) | 食神 | **ABSENT** | 0 | 0 |  |
| Hurting Officer (HO) | 傷官 | **PRESENT** | 0 | 2 | month_branch_hidden_2, day_branch_hidden_1 |
| Indirect Wealth (IW) | 偏財 | **ABSENT** | 0 | 0 |  |
| Direct Wealth (DW) | 正財 | **PRESENT** | 0 | 2 | year_branch_hidden_2, month_branch_hidden_1 |
| Seven Killings (7K) | 七殺 | **PROMINENT** | 2 | 1 | year_stem, hour_stem, hour_branch_primary_qi |
| Direct Officer (DO) | 正官 | **PROMINENT** | 1 | 1 | year_branch_hidden_1, month_stem |
| Indirect Resource (IR) | 偏印 | **HIDDEN_ONLY** | 0 | 1 | hour_branch_hidden_1 |
| Direct Resource (DR) | 正印 | **HIDDEN_ONLY** | 0 | 1 | day_branch_hidden_2 |

**Friend (比肩)**: Friend (比肩) is PROMINENT — strong self-identity, competitive nature, many rivals in same field.

**Rob Wealth (劫財)**: Rob Wealth (劫財) is present — some financial leakage through competition.

**Eating God (食神)**: Eating God (食神) is absent — lacks natural creative expression and easy joy.

**Hurting Officer (傷官)**: Hurting Officer (傷官) is present — creative edge with some authority conflicts.

**Indirect Wealth (偏財)**: Indirect Wealth (偏財) is absent — windfall opportunities rare, must earn steadily.

**Direct Wealth (正財)**: Direct Wealth (正財) is present — stable finances and commitment capacity.

**Seven Killings (七殺)**: Seven Killings (七殺) is PROMINENT — aggressive drive, power-hungry, risk of violence or legal issues.

**Direct Officer (正官)**: Prominent Direct Officer = natural authority, good reputation, but can be rigid.

**Indirect Resource (偏印)**: Indirect Resource (偏印) is present — some unconventional wisdom and backing.

**Direct Resource (正印)**: Direct Resource (正印) is present — reasonable educational and health foundation.

### Spouse Star: wife star (正財)

Status: PRESENT. Locations: year_branch_hidden_2, month_branch_hidden_1

### Children Stars: 7K / DO

### Notable Patterns

- **companion_heavy**: Too many companions (Friend + Rob Wealth) = competition problems, wealth leakage, relationship interference
- **7k_prominent**: Seven Killings prominent WITHOUT control = aggressive, ruthless, danger of conflicts


---

## SECTION 4: BRANCH INTERACTIONS (地支关系)

### Six Clashes (六冲)

- **辰戌冲 (Earth vs Earth)**
  - Palaces: Year (Parents/Ancestry), Day (Self/Spouse)
  - Severity: severe

### Half Three Harmony (半三合)

- **寅戌半合Fire局 (missing 午)**
  - Palaces: Day (Self/Spouse), Hour (Children/Legacy)
  - Severity: mild

### Punishments (三刑)

- **丑未戌 无礼之刑 (PARTIAL) - Bullying/Rudeness Punishment**
  - Palaces: Month (Career/Social), Day (Self/Spouse)
  - Severity: moderate

### Destructions (破)

- **辰丑破**
  - Palaces: Year (Parents/Ancestry), Month (Career/Social)
  - Severity: mild


---

## SECTION 5: SHEN SHA FULL AUDIT (神煞)

### Present Stars

| Star | Chinese | Location | Palace | Nature | Severity | Void? |
|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| Heavenly Noble | 天乙贵人 | Chou | month | auspicious | mild |  |
| Void Star | 空亡 | Chen | year | inauspicious | moderate | VOID |
| Canopy Star | 华盖 | Chen | year | mixed | mild | VOID |
| Canopy Star | 华盖 | Xu | day | mixed | mild |  |
| Traveling Horse | 驿马 | Yin | hour | mixed | mild |  |
| Earth's Snare | 地网 | Chen | year | inauspicious | moderate | VOID |
| Heaven's Net | 天罗 | Xu | day | inauspicious | moderate |  |
| Widow Star | 寡宿 | Chou | month | inauspicious | moderate |  |
| Ten Evils Great Defeat | 十恶大败 |  |  | inauspicious | severe |  |
| Kui Gang | 魁罡 |  |  | mixed | moderate |  |
| Hanging Guest | 吊客 | Yin | hour | inauspicious | moderate |  |
| White Tiger | 白虎 | Xu | day | inauspicious | severe |  |
| Child Star | 童子 | Chen | year | inauspicious | moderate | VOID |

### Derivation Details

- **天乙贵人 (Heavenly Noble)**: For Wu DM: Tian Yi at 丑 (Chou). Found in month palace.
  - *Heavenly Noble — powerful protector. In trouble, help always comes from unexpected sources.*
- **空亡 (Void Star)**: Day Pillar 戊戌 is in 甲午旬. Void at 辰. Found in year.
  - *Void Star — the branch is 'empty'. Whatever that palace governs feels hollow or unfulfilled.*
  - **NOTE: This star sits on a VOID branch. Its effect is weakened or unreliable.**
- **华盖 (Canopy Star)**: For year branch 辰: Hua Gai at 辰. In year.
  - *Hua Gai present = the hermit's star. Deep thinker, but lonely unless embraced.*
  - **NOTE: This star sits on a VOID branch. Its effect is weakened or unreliable.**
- **华盖 (Canopy Star)**: For day branch 戌: Hua Gai at 戌. In day.
  - *Canopy Star — solitary, spiritual, intellectual. Prefers isolation over crowds.*
- **驿马 (Traveling Horse)**: For year branch 辰: Yi Ma at 寅. In hour.
  - *Traveling Horse — constant motion. Career involves travel, relocation, change.*
- **地网 (Earth's Snare)**: 辰 in year palace = Earth's Snare (地网).
  - *Earth's Snare — grounded but trapped. Difficulty escaping situations.*
  - **NOTE: This star sits on a VOID branch. Its effect is weakened or unreliable.**
- **天罗 (Heaven's Net)**: 戌 in day palace = Heaven's Net (天罗).
  - *Heaven's Net — feeling trapped, especially in legal or relationship matters.*
- **寡宿 (Widow Star)**: For 辰 year: Gua Su at 丑. PRESENT.
  - *Widow Star — loneliness in relationships, especially for females.*
- **十恶大败 (Ten Evils Great Defeat)**: Day Pillar 戊戌: IS a Ten Evils day.
  - *Ten Evils Great Defeat — historical marker for extreme misfortune with wealth.*
- **魁罡 (Kui Gang)**: Day Pillar 戊戌: IS a Kui Gang day.
  - *Kui Gang — powerful, commanding, but hard on relationships and self.*
- **吊客 (Hanging Guest)**: Year - 2 positions = 寅. PRESENT.
  - *Hanging Guest — attending funerals, dealing with grief.*
- **白虎 (White Tiger)**: For 辰 year: Bai Hu at 戌. PRESENT.
  - *White Tiger — violent energy. Risk of accidents, surgery, bloodshed.*
- **童子 (Child Star)**: Born in Winter, DM element Earth. Check for 卯, 巳, 辰, 未. 辰 found in year.
  - *Child Star — soul of a celestial servant. Marriage difficulty, health issues, karmic debt.*
  - **NOTE: This star sits on a VOID branch. Its effect is weakened or unreliable.**

### Notable Absences

- **天乙贵人 (Heavenly Noble)**: No Heavenly Noble = less natural protection. Must build own safety nets.
- **天德贵人 (Heavenly Virtue)**: No Heavenly Virtue. Misfortunes hit at full force.
- **文昌贵人 (Academic Star)**: No Academic Star. Education success requires more effort.
- **禄神 (Prosperity Star)**: No Prosperity Star = wealth must be actively fought for.
- **将星 (General Star)**: No General Star = must build authority from scratch.
- **天医 (Heavenly Doctor)**: No Heavenly Doctor = health needs more active management.
- **红鸾 (Red Phoenix)**: No Red Phoenix = romance comes later or with less intensity.


---

## SECTION 6: RED FLAGS — DIRECT AND UNFILTERED

### Marriage & Relationships (8 indicators)

- **[SEVERE] 六冲** (branch_interaction): 辰戌冲 (Earth vs Earth)
- **[MODERATE] companion_heavy** (ten_god): Too many companions (Friend + Rob Wealth) = competition problems, wealth leakage, relationship interference

## SECTION 7: CURRENT LUCK PILLAR ANALYSIS (大运)

---

## SECTION 8: HEALTH ANALYSIS (健康)

### Element Balance

| Element | Count | Status | Organs at Risk |
|---|---|---|---|
| Wood (木) | 4.0 | EXCESS | anger, headaches, high blood pressure, eye problems |
| Fire (火) | 0.3 | DEFICIENT | poor circulation, cold extremities, depression, low energy |
| Earth (土) | 3.4 | EXCESS | overthinking, bloating, weight gain, obsessive worry |
| Metal (金) | 0.3 | DEFICIENT | weak immune system, asthma, dry skin, frequent colds |
| Water (水) | 0.3 | DEFICIENT | lower back pain, weak bones, hearing loss, infertility, premature aging |

### Organ Systems at Risk

- **Wood EXCESS**: Liver (肝) and Gallbladder (胆) overloaded. Watch for: anger, headaches, high blood pressure, eye problems. Body parts affected: eyes, tendons, nails.
- **Fire DEFICIENT**: Heart (心) and Small Intestine (小肠) weakened. Watch for: poor circulation, cold extremities, depression, low energy. Body parts affected: tongue, blood vessels, complexion.
- **Earth EXCESS**: Spleen (脾) and Stomach (胃) overloaded. Watch for: overthinking, bloating, weight gain, obsessive worry. Body parts affected: mouth, muscles, flesh.
- **Metal DEFICIENT**: Lungs (肺) and Large Intestine (大肠) weakened. Watch for: weak immune system, asthma, dry skin, frequent colds. Body parts affected: nose, skin, body hair.
- **Water DEFICIENT**: Kidneys (肾) and Bladder (膀胱) weakened. Watch for: lower back pain, weak bones, hearing loss, infertility, premature aging. Body parts affected: ears, bones, reproductive system.

### Health-Related Stars

- **吊客 (Hanging Guest)**: Hanging Guest — attending funerals, dealing with grief.
- **白虎 (White Tiger)**: White Tiger — violent energy. Risk of accidents, surgery, bloodshed.
- **童子 (Child Star)**: Child Star — soul of a celestial servant. Marriage difficulty, health issues, karmic debt.


---

## SECTION 9: REMEDIES & WHAT MUST CHANGE

### 9a. Elemental Remedies

**Useful God Element: Water (水)**

- **Colors to wear**: black, dark blue, navy
- **Colors to avoid**: yellow, brown
- **Favorable directions**: North, South, West, Northwest
- **Industries**: shipping, tourism, aquaculture, logistics, IT/data
- **Environment**: water features, fish tanks, flowing water sounds

### 9b. Behavioral Changes

- Channel excess energy into productive output (creative work, exercise).
- Practice patience and listening. Your strength can bulldoze others.
- Give more than you take. Generosity balances your chart.

### 9c. Relationship Guidance

- Best partner element alignment: Water (水)
- Your spouse palace (Day Branch): 戌 (Xu)

### 9d. Financial Strategy

- Wealth element (Water) can be handled. Take calculated risks in favorable years.

### 9e. Relocation & Environment

- Crossing Water benefit: **MODERATE** (score: 3/5)
  - Water is a favorable element for this chart
  - Water element severely depleted (count: 0.3)
  - Traveling Horse (驿马) present = natural traveler
- Ideal climate: cold, coastal, or near bodies of water
- Ideal geography: coastal cities, river valleys, island nations, lakeside

**This chart moderately benefits from crossing water. Living near water or abroad will significantly help.**

## SECTION 11: HONEST SUMMARY

### Core Life Lesson

*You have abundant energy but it needs direction. Your lesson is channeling power into productive outlets rather than letting it stagnate.*

### Designed For vs. Fighting Against

This chart is designed to thrive with **Water** energy — shipping type environments.

The biggest fight is against excessive **Wood** energy, which stagnates this chart.

### The Single Most Important Thing

**Balance is everything.** Your chart has real strengths but also real vulnerabilities. The useful god (Water) must be consistently present in your environment, career, and relationships. When it is, everything flows. When it isn't, problems compound.

Suppressing it causes anxiety, insomnia, and restlessness. The Child Star suggests your soul carries memories from before this life. Classical remedy: 送替身 ritual to settle the spirit. Seek a qualified spiritual teacher or mentor.

items.value: Earth in excess (40%). overthinking, bloating, weight gain, obsessive worry. Wood controls Earth. Weak Wood means digestive system (Spleen/Stomach) can become unregulated. Body parts: mouth, muscles, flesh.

items.value: Metal severely deficient (4%). weak immune system, asthma, dry skin, frequent colds. Fire controls Metal. Weak Fire means respiratory system (Lungs) and immune response are unregulated. Body parts: nose, skin, body hair.

items.value: Water severely deficient (4%). lower back pain, weak bones, hearing loss, infertility, premature aging. Water in Dead (死) seasonal state — heightened kidneys vulnerability. Body parts: ears, bones, reproductive system.

sections.title: Honest Summary
sections.text: You are Wu Earth (戊土). Personality: reliable, patient, stubborn, protective, slow-to-change. Your Day Master is extremely strong (44% element presence, 20% = balanced). You have overwhelming energy. The risk is stagnation and bulldozing over others. Marriage: One significant marriage challenge exists. Awareness and timing can mitigate it. Health: Watch Heart (Fire), Lungs (Metal), Kidneys (Water) — these elements are deficient in your chart. Life lesson: You have abundant energy but it needs direction. Your lesson is channeling power into productive outlets rather than letting it stagnate. Your useful god is Water (currently at 3.2% — most deficient). Adding Water brings the chart closest to 20% equilibrium across all five elements. Favorable: Water, Metal, Fire. Unfavorable: Wood, Earth (already excessive). Everything in your life improves when you increase Water element exposure.
